slide.title: Performance - Simple enhancements
slide.blurb: The issue: Often used simple constructs can waste a valid amount of time

list.bullet: A main usage of webapplications is string processing.
Look for the most often used constructs in your application

slide.blurb: The solution: Simple optimizations can save a lot of time

list.bullet: Prefer ' over " and save a step of parsing.
Use echo's multiple parameters instead of string concatenation.
